outline:
1. to dress, wear, clothe, put on clothing, be clothed
    1. (Qal)
      1. to put on clothes, be clothed, wear
      2. to put on, be clothed with (fig.)
    2. (Pual) to be fully clothed
    3. (Hiphil) to clothe, array with, dress
kjv_def: (in) apparel, arm, array (self), clothe (self), come upon, put (on, upon), wear.
strongs_def: properly, wrap around, i.e. (by implication) to put on agarment or clothe (oneself, or another), literally or figuratively
